commits.message:
Framework for filtering on resource properties (EUCA-4664)

Support is added for EC2 filtering of resources.

The Filter data object is moved to Messages from Unimplemented. Existing
messages that use filters are updated to use the correct parameter name
and annotations.

Filter, Filters and FilterSupport classes have been added as the
filtering API and CloudMetadatas updated as a facade for general
resource filtering. Filter is a filter instance which can be used in a
service class, Filters is the registry for obtaining a Filter and for
any utility methods. An instance of FilterSupport is created for each
resource that supports filtering, these will be discovered during boot
by FilterDiscovery.

Entities has been updated to include a new query method that accepts a
user provided Criteria.
